about_the_game:
Play as a member of the Order of the Vortex, a Star Knight tasked with defending the human kingdoms from the terrors that lie within the Vortex. This rogue-lite, bullet-hell, shoot-em-up will test your skill as well as your decision making abilities. Unlockable ships and crew members, combined with a variety of ship attachments and powerful relics, allows for tons of unique builds and synergies. Fight waves of enemies, defeat deadly bosses, and make your way to the dark heart of the Vortex.

The Vortex:

A massive rift in space and time, created by an ancient, forgotten power. Filled to the brim with horrifying creatures, the Vortex is an incredibly hostile environment in which only the strongest can survive.

  • Battle waves of enemies as you fight to reach the dark heart of the Vortex
  • Defeat dangerous bosses and complete challenge levels up earn powerful relics
  • Ascend through Void Crystals to increase the difficulty and change up the game

The Order:

The Order of the Vortex is a knightly order sworn to defend humanity from the horrors of the Vortex. As a knight of the order, make use of their resources to create the ultimate build.

  • Unlock new ships, each with their own strengths and weaknesses
  • Choose from an assortment of unlockable crew members to change the way you play
  • Add attachments to your ship and upgrade them with credits you collect in each level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9880H CPU @ 2.30GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is a rogue-lite, bullet-hell, shoot-em-up with the ability to create unique builds and synergies, and test your skills in action-packed gameplay. Choose your crew, upgrade your ship, and explore the unknown depths of the Vortex.
